title: Fixing communication issues
body:
Perhaps you could add a separate chatbox which has a record of ALL messages sent to the server in the lobby in order of how the server received them, rather than a clientside chatbox which shows messages according to how the client received them. This should fix teh role call issues and identify when people are simply Ekko locking. 

SUGGESTION 2
In normies, I would suggest you remove the lock feature from normies. I have NEVER seen it been used positively except to force position.
